author: Ellen Mitchell
title: Pentagon mulling ways to get more lethal aid to Ukraine | TheHill
description: The U.S. military will provide additional lethal aid for Ukraine but is worki...
content:
The U.S. military will provide additional lethal aid for Ukraine but is working through the logistics of delivery given the contested airspace over Ukraine, the Pentagons top spokesman said Friday.
